程序包 org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.data

接口 InsightFactory

  • 所有已知实现类:
    InsightFactory_Impl
    public interface InsightFactory
    Provides the interface for managing user insights within the application. This includes querying, finding, saving, matching, updating, and deleting user data.
    作者:
    Giuseppe Abrami
